channel.title: Quick question about 508 server
channel.description:
i got my server to work and all. i got the client too :o
but im wondering how do i let other people on my server?
i already port forwarded and ect.. like i can get people on my 317 server, but when i searched "server, for the server ip in the client to change it to mine it came up with nothing?? so what do i do,
or is there special client that i need to use???
pm me on msn if u want: envymike@live.com[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 15, 2008, 01:53:51 pm[/size][hr]wow m dog, remature, lock it because of a video? does it say that on the rules??[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 15, 2008, 02:13:59 pm[/size][hr]ne 1 please??
